comment: Mr. Pike is a chill teacher and will go far in life :)
Very confusing.  Gave conflicting information and was really unclear on test and quiz questions.  The material is difficult because that's anatomy, but it was made more difficult by Pike.
He is a wonderful professor and he is easy on the eyes! He makes this lab a breeze. TAKE HIM!

He is young and relatable! You come to class, he lectures, and you get the option to stay and study or leave. There are only 2 tests (like all labs), but he always answers questions thoroughly and answers e-mails quickly! I would totally take this professor again. Attendance is for a grade, so go to class. You won't stay the whole time.
